title: [Skin Idea] Beautiful Bride Katarina & Handsome Groom Garen
body:
Hi,

I am not very talented in terms of drawing but the new Champion Tahm Kench made me think of this Skin-Combination.
For skins can display alternate realities I think this would be a combination that everyone would love :)

Maybe some Artist can even provide Skin-Ideas?

Hope you like the idea.

Kind regards,
Nate

replies.body: Dies ist das Deutsche Forum, und vielleicht l√§sst Riot sich ja inspirieren.
